channel.title: event on Plazi
channel.description: Recent content in event on Plazi

item.title: Oct 21, 2021. 17th Int'l Conference on Digital Preservation, Beijing, China
item.description: October 21, 2021: Beijing, China Plazi together with Data Futures, MNHN France, SIB Switzerland and CERN Switzerland will present the lecture “Progress with improving preservation and reuse of scientific research data. Abstract: We report progress towards automatically transforming existing analyses of scientific literature into annotations based on W3C’s Web Annotation Data Model (WADM). Case studies are presented from the life sciences, and social sciences and humanities, in which these developments have led to the creation of new unrestricted data services for the research community.
